Condition: Act = Mittens training; Obs = Observational Training
Yoking: Infants in observational condition were paired to infants of similar age and sex and received matched amounts of mittened activity to their paired partner and matching counterbalancing in habituation paradigm; infants labeled 1 (act-32; obs-19) were paired, etc.)
Object_Right: Object on the right side of the stage in habituation trials
Habituation_Goal: Object reached for in habituation trials
Reach_Type: Arm always approached from off-stage; near reaches (in habituation) were closer to side the arm emerged from; far reaches reached across the entire stage to contact the further toy
First3Hab: sum of first 3 (used to define hab criteria)
Number Hab Trials: # trials needed to meet habituation criteria; minimum of 6, maximum of 14
Familiarization Trial: in seconds (looking after toys placement switched with no action)
OldGoal_Total: sum of old goals (regardless of number of trials with data)
NewGoal_Total: sum of new goals (regardless of number of trials with data)
